post.desc:
Huh? Is Kokoro **tall** or **short**? I've assumed that she's on the taller side. For one, if this pixel comparison [chart](https://sukimas.tumblr.com/post/735088364337938432/i-made-a-height-chart-for-aocf-based-on) is accurate, she's even [taller than Kasen](https://64.media.tumblr.com/2401b328d28fa6d609ea123b7d8761f9/ac598c4c9ad44ec3-ea/s1280x1920/89aa5098760c79899ceaa552630e076b776055c7.png).

But I've also seen quite a few fanarts with her at about the same if not just slightly taller height than Koishi.
